channel.title: Go test -failfast in CI
channel.description:
Should we put it?
Pros: - faster notification about test failing
Cons: - limited knowleage to only first failing test (not all)
[poll type=regular public=true] * add `-failfast` falg * keep it as it is [/poll]

item.title: Go test -failfast in CI
item.dc:creator: Nicolas
item.description:
I prefer to let the execution of tests after a failed one to see if there are other test that failed.
Also, because the test takes so much time to execute, I prefer to execute all of them rather than having to relaunch the test a bunch of time.
